node.title: Vaccines for children are coming. These are the frontrunners
node.alt: Young mum stands in a park beside her son while pushing her daughter on a swing
node.description: As vaccination rates across the world creep higher, children are about to get their turn, with the United States due to green-light Pfizer for five year olds.
node.content:
["Australia's COVID-19 vaccination program might be hitting new milestones, but the youngest members of the community have still not been offered protection.", "That might soon change, with the national medical regulator flagging a possible decision on whether to make the Pfizer vaccine available to primary school-aged children by the end of the month.", "Other countries are moving more quickly.", "
American kids could be vaccinated by Christmas
", "In the United States, 28 million children between the ages of five and 11 could start receiving vaccines within days, pending the approval of federal regulators.", "Pfizer plans to offer young children smaller doses of the vaccine, which will come in orange-capped vials to distinguish them from those given to people aged 12 and older.", "Like with adults, the two doses would be spaced three weeks apart, with family doctors and pharmacies expected to play a major role in administering them.", "\"For the adults they were focusing more on large vaccine sites, but for the children we're really hoping to prioritise giving it to doctors' offices, so kids and parents can come to places that they're comfortable going to,\" Washington DC-based paediatrician Dr Jessica Long said.", "More than 1.8 million children in the five to 11-year-old age range are estimated to have been diagnosed with COVID-19 across the US, with nearly 150 deaths.", "", "
Astrid, 6, will be vaccinated once Pfizer is made available to children in the United States.\u00a0\u00a0(ABC News: Jade Macmillan)
", "The clinic where Dr Long works has been inundated by parents wanting to know when they will be able to book their children in for a shot.", "\"Kids get COVID. We know they don't get it as often or as seriously, but now that the older populations are vaccinated, we're seeing even more and more numbers of children coming down with it,\" she said.", "\"And there can be long-term side effects, some that we don't even know about yet.\"", "Musician Sandy Choi wants her children, nine-year-old David and six-year-old Astrid, to receive their shots as soon as possible.", "\"Hopefully the kids will even be able to get vaccinated before the holidays, it would be such a breath of relief for us,\" she said.\u00a0", "\"We have family members we haven't seen since before the pandemic and we know that if the kids can at least get the first vaccine shot then there's a really good chance that we'll be able to get together.\"", "", "
Sandy Choi hopes\u00a0her children can receive at least one shot before Christmas.\u00a0(ABC News: Jade Macmillan)
", "
Moderna vaccine could also be on offer
", "The authorisation of the Pfizer vaccine for children under the age of 12 still has several hurdles to clear.", "A panel advising the US Food and Drug Administration (FDA) voted overwhelmingly in favour of the move, arguing the benefits outweighed any risk.\u00a0", "The FDA has since endorsed that recommendation, with the Centers for Disease Control expected to make its own decision soon.", "In the US, Pfizer is not the only company pushing to vaccinate children between five and 11 years old, with Moderna publishing promising trial results ahead of making a formal application.", "", "
Jessica Long says vaccinating children is an important step in controlling COVID-19 \u2014 and preventing new variants from developing.\u00a0(ABC News: Jade Macmillan\u00a0)
", "Dr Long has four children herself and is optimistic the next stage of the rollout will make a difference.", "\"The more people vaccinated, the less chance of people getting sick, the less chance of this virus mutating to something more powerful like we've seen with the Delta variant and other situations,\" she said.", "\"So I don't know if it's going to be the last piece of the puzzle, but it's certainly a really important step.\"", "
Vaccines for younger children
", "While Pfizer waits for the FDA's decision on the use of its vaccine for children aged five to 11, the company is also trialling the drug on those aged between two and five, as well as babies as young as six months.", "Pfizer says those results are expected \"as soon as fourth quarter 2021 or early first quarter 2022\".", "", "
Pfizer is aiming to submit data on the use of its vaccine in babies as young as six months by early next year.\u00a0(ABC News: Som Patidar)
", "In India, some hospitals are already asking parents to register children as young as two for a COVID-19 vaccine.\u00a0", "The locally made Covaxin shot has been widely used as part of India's vaccine rollout, which has so far seen 1 billion doses administered into the arms of adults across the country.", "Now, the vaccine's maker Bharat Biotech is seeking approval from India's drug regulator to administer the dose to anyone aged two\u00a0to 18.", "As with the US approvals process, there are multiple hurdles to clear before children can start receiving the shot.", "Most recently, the Indian government's expert committee recommended\u00a0the\u00a0emergency use of Covaxin for children.", "Now, the Drug Controller General of India \u2014 the equivalent to Australia's Therapeutic Goods Administration \u2014 is set to make a ruling.", "On Monday, the TGA listed Covaxin as a recognised\u00a0vaccine in Australia \"for the purpose of establishing a traveller's vaccination status\" for anyone aged 12 or older.", "In India, Bharat Biotech has submitted data from the drug's phase 3\u00a0trials involving children.\u00a0", "According to local media reports, the data showed the Covaxin shot produced a similar rate of efficacy among children as it did in adults \u2014 77.8 per cent.\u00a0", "", "
Children as young as two could soon be receiving COVID-19 vaccines in India.\u00a0(Reuters: Adnan Abidi)
", "If the\u00a0vaccine is approved for children, India's most vulnerable young people will be given access to the drug first.\u00a0", "In southern India, Ankura Hospital is preparing to vaccinate children in its paediatric ward.", "\"Our hospital is already doing adult vaccinations and preparation is underway for kids' vaccination. We are fully prepared and will start after the government's nod,\u201d\u00a0paediatrician Dr Suman Kumar said.\u00a0", "Dr Kumar said children with pre-existing heart conditions, lung and renal problems,\u00a0diabetes, immune deficiency and other serious health complications are \"most vulnerable, so vaccination should start with them\".\u00a0\u00a0", "\"We have observed mortalities in previous waves and children of 16 to 18 age group are affected as much as adults,\" he said.\u00a0", "", "
Experts believe young school children should receive a vaccination after those with health complications and after 16 to 18-year-olds.\u00a0(AP:\u00a0Anupam Nath)
", "With more than 1 billion doses administered, India has only fully vaccinated 30\u00a0per cent of its eligible population, and the number of people receiving the shot each day has been slowing down.\u00a0", "Bringing children into the rollout will use up more supply.\u00a0", "Dr Kumar said a \"huge stockpile\" of Covaxin was required before starting a mass vaccination drive among India's population of young children.", "\"They are [scaling] up their production, but still the government would like to fully vaccinate adults before starting the mass vaccination of kids,\" he said.\u00a0", "India's expert committee on vaccines has said all children from the age of two will be able to access the vaccine from early 2022.\u00a0\u00a0", "Young people aged 12 to 18 are already eligible for vaccines in a number of countries, including Australia.", "India is expected to open\u00a0its program to this age group soon, and they will be able to access a needle-free\u00a0shot.\u00a0", "Another vaccine developed in India \u2014 by manufacturer Zydus Cadila \u2014 is the world's first DNA vaccine.", "It carries the genetic code for the coronavirus spike protein, which the body can then read and generate an immune response.", "The vaccine, called ZyCoV-D, is delivered via a jet injector\u00a0\u2014 sometimes called a gene gun \u2014 and\u00a0uses a high-pressure stream of fluid to blast it into the cells of the skin.", "", "
The DNA-based vaccine is administered using a needle-free injection system.(AP:\u00a0Business Wire)
", "
Vaccinating children across the world
", "The Covaxin shot was developed in India and is currently being assessed by the World Health Organization for inclusion on the list of globally accepted COVID-19 vaccines.\u00a0", "Approval from the WHO would see Bharat Biotech's\u00a0Covaxin shot join Pfizer, Moderna, AstraZeneca, Sinovac, Sinopharm, Johnson and Johnson and the Serum Institute vaccine\u00a0as drugs approved for emergency use.\u00a0", "", "
In El Salvador, children as young as six can be vaccinated against COVID-19.\u00a0(Reuters: Jose Cabezas\u00a0\u00a0)
", "China recently brought children into its vaccination program, with\u00a0authorities approving\u00a0the use of the Sinopharm and Sinovac shots for those aged three to 17.\u00a0\u00a0", "After the vaccines received the domestic approval, foreign governments began giving the shots to children in their own countries.", "Cambodia uses both Sinovac and Sinopharm's shots in children six to 11. Regulators in Chile and El Salvador approved Sinovac for children as young as six. In Argentina, regulators approved the Sinopharm vaccine for children as young as three.", "Cuba has also started vaccinating children as young as two, but the country has been using local\u00a0vaccines that have not been approved by the WHO, or had their\u00a0trial data independently reviewed.\u00a0", "ABC/AP"]
